short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DeskTime is real-time time tracking service that analyzes productivity. The only fully automatic time tracking software.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How many of have been working on something really important on your computer and then have been distracted something funny on the Internet? 

Happens more times than you’d like. Because of that we really sense that there is a need for a product that would manage how much time is wasted on computers each day. 

It tracks what employees do on their computers, meaning, how much time is spent working with productive applications like Word, Excel and how much with distracting things like Facebook and Twitter. It’s like Google Analytics for employees and a great tool for management. 

It’s easy, hassle-free and automatic and real-time. This combination makes it different than anything else that’s out there. Also market reach for such a product is vast - nowadays almost every uses computer as their primary tool to get things done and using a product like DeskTime just makes sense.

Main features:
- Fully automatic, no data entry for time tracking
- Timesheets
- Reports to your email
- Available on Android and iPhone
